CustomField.description: This formula field loads specific icons base on the value of the field CRT Client Type
CustomField.formula: Case( CRT_Client_Types__c,"","ERROR",image("/img/icon/"&case(CRT_Client_Types__c,"Prospect","lookup32.png","IB Client","custom51_100/compass32.png","PBB Client","bank32.png","CRT Child","hands32.png","CRT Top Parent","building32.png","Non CRT Account","diamond32.png","/custom51_100/buildingBlock32.png"),CRT_Client_Types__c))
CustomField.label: CRT Client Type Indicator
